articles.description: The boss of the social media firm also warns workers to prepare for "difficult times", reports say.
articles.content:
Elon Musk has told Twitter staff that remote working will end and "difficult times" lie ahead, according to reports.
In an email to staff, the owner of the social media firm said workers would be ex… [+3926 chars]
